visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly rainfall data with a custom color scheme. Additionally, configure the chart with custom export button settings.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes for better readability. The data series represents monthly rainfall data, with each data point corresponding to a month. A custom color scheme is applied to the series, enhancing visual distinction. Additionally, the chart includes custom settings for the export button, allowing users to export the chart with a blue circle symbol. This configuration ensures a visually appealing and functional chart for displaying monthly rainfall data.
